thread.title: 'Thor: Ragnarok': The God of Thunder May Team Up With Hulk
thread.title_full: 'Thor: Ragnarok': The God of Thunder May Team Up With Hulk

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Thor: Ragnarok': The God of Thunder May Team Up With Hulk
text:
Comments The hammer-wielding superhero may be joined by the gamma-infected monster in the third installment of 'Thor' movie series. 
Superheroes teaming up seems to be the main characteristic of Marvel's Phase Three as Ant-Man will be joined by the Wasp in " Ant-Man and the Wasp " and Captain America will team up with numerous superheroes in " Captain America: Civil War ". JoBlo brings words about another team-up movie in Phase Three, saying that Thor will be supported by fellow hero Hulk in the upcoming " Thor: Ragnarok ". Mark Ruffalo 's Hulk will team up with Chris Hemsworth 's Thor to deal with "what amounts to the Norse Apocalypse." The site claimed that Tom Hiddleston 's Loki and Jaimie Alexander 's Lady Sif would make appearances and the movie would involve a "distant planet" that's "not Asgard and not Earth." Given that there would be a third planet, people started to assume that the upcoming movie would bring in the long-rumored Planet Hulk storyline. However, it is not the only possibility, considering that there are 9 worlds on Yggdrasil, and each constitutes a planet of its own. "Thor: Ragnarok" will be the last movie in the Asgardian trilogy. It is directed by Taika Waititi with the script penned by Craig Kyle and Christopher Yost. Produced by Kevin Feige, the God of Thunder movie is slated to be released Stateside on November 2, 2017.
